S.FORM: pincwi'an 例句:Rimuy, ita sazing hya ga, kahul squ yaba ta pincwayan ta ./ 例句:Sabi, simu ki Tapas hya ga,kahul squ yaba mamu ki mamu qu pincwi'an mamu →撒碧, ./ 例句:simu mtsway qani ga, kahul squ lkkwatas mamuw qu qpincwi'an mamu hya ./

pincwi'an 例句:Rimoy, ita sazing hya ga, kahol sqo yaba ta pincwayan ta ./ 例句:Sabi, simo ki Tapas hya ga,kahol sqo yaba mamo ki mamo qo pincwi'an mamo →撒碧, ./ 例句:simo mtsway qani ga, kahol sqo lkkwatas mamow qo qpincwi'an mamo hya ./
